The claim was shared on Facebook on Octo: 2020, in a public group with more than 30,000 members.
The Korea Disease Control and Prevention: KDCA) confirmed that at least 72 people have died after receiving flu shots as part of the nationwide vaccination program.
The South Korean health ministry: s Biopharmaceutical Quality Management Division stated that none of the vaccines imported from China were being used as flu vaccines in South Korea, and all flu vaccines administered in the country were either manufactured domestically or imported from France or Germany.
